title: Ep 242: To Infinity and Beyond (Ft. Holly & Dolla)
itunes:title: Ep 242: To Infinity and Beyond (Ft. Holly & Dolla)
description:
This week on Whoreible Decisions Mandii and Weezy are joined by a couple, Holly and Dolla, who refer to their relationship as “INFINIMANY”. The lifestylers who also identify their relationship as being OPEN while they also SWING discuss how all relationships should be customizable to fit each partners needs. We start off with ice breakers to dig into fantasies, turn ons and sex club behaviors. Holly shares how her partner Dolla allowed her to live out her fantasy of an MMF threesome and the deets are JUICY! This week’s vanilla sh-t is wild and we get into cock cage alternatives (https://lockedinlust.com/shop/?gclid=Cj0KCQjwm9yJBhDTARIsABKIcGbrkaYGrjcpCzh7kcbTWxo9-oJIFjdJnuFz2foUavAGulwyn_blWlIaAtaOEALw_wcB) More on tips to secure a Unicorn and having a successful non-monogamous relationship.


Follow this week's guest on Instagram Holly @mzhollydollaz and Dolla @dollajones718


Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Twitter @whoreiblepod


Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!
